description: This dashboard visualizes the controller-runtime and workqueue metrics. It provides insights into the performance, behavior, and reconciliation efficiency of the Aerospike Operator.

panels.description: This panel shows the uptime of the operator.
panels.title: Operator Uptime

panels.description: Total number of successful REST client requests.
panels.title: REST Client Successful Requests  by Status Codes (rate) (total)

panels.description: Total number of failure REST client requests.
panels.title: REST Client Failure Requests by Status Code (rate) (total)

panels.description:
Shows the current leader
which handles the requests.
panels.title: Leader Status

panels.description:
Total number of Successful webhook
requests.
panels.title: Webhook  Successful Requests by Status Code (rate) (total)

panels.description:
Total number of failure webhook
requests.
panels.title: Webhook Failures Requests by Status Code (rate) (total)

panels.description:
Current number
of admission
requests being
served.
panels.title: Webhook Requests In Flight (total)

panels.description: Displays the total workqueue depth (pending items) of each controller.
panels.title: Workqueue Depth

panels.description: Total duration (in seconds) of the longest-running workqueue processor for each controller.
panels.title: Workqueue Longest Running Time

panels.description: Shows how many workers are currently processing tasks for each controller.
panels.title: Active Workers

panels.description:
Total number of reconciliation errors per
controller.
panels.title: Reconcile Errors (rate)

panels.description: Current depth of workqueue workers per controller.
panels.title: Workqueue Depth

panels.description: Duration (in seconds) of the longest-running workqueue processor. Helps identify processing delays.
panels.title: Workqueue Longest Runnig Processor Seconds

panels.description: Total number of retries handled by workqueue.
panels.title: Workqueue Retries (rate)

panels.description: How many seconds of work has been done that is in progress and hasn’t been observed by work_duration.Large values indicate stuck threads. One can deduce the number of stuck threads by observing the rate at which this increases.
panels.title: Workqueue Unfinished Work Seconds

panels.description: Total number of adds handled by workqueue.
panels.title: Workqueue Adds (rate)

panels.description: How long in seconds an item stays in workqueue before being requested
panels.title: Workqueue Queue Duration

panels.description: How long in seconds processing an item from workqueue takes.
panels.title: Workqueue Work Duration

panels.description: Latency of processing admission requests.
panels.title: Webhook Latency Duration

panels.description: Time per reconciliation per controller before being requested from the workqueue.
panels.title: Reconcile Duration

panels.description: Number of currently used workers per controller.
panels.title: Active Workers

panels.description: Total number of reconciliations per controller.
panels.title: Reconcile (rate)

panels.description: Total number of reconciliation errors and terminal errors per controller.
panels.title: Reconcile & Terminal Errors (rate)

panels.description: Number of concurrent reconciles per controller.
panels.title: Max Concurrent Reconciles

panels.description: Total number of admission requests by HTTP status code.
panels.title: Webhook Requests (rate) (total)

panels.description:
Current number of admission requests being
served.
panels.title: Webhook In Flight Requests

panels.description: Total number of REST client requests.
panels.title: Rest Client Requests (rate) (total)

title: Aerospike Kubernetes Operator View
